body_html:
@sandipmgiri , this test is not failing for me on ppc64le.

This is how I run the entire unit test bucket:
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
screen -L
export TF_BUILD_CONTAINER_TYPE="CPU.PPC64LE"
export TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION="PYTHON2"
export TF_BUILD_IS_OPT="OPT"
export TF_BUILD_IS_PIP="NO_PIP"
export TF_BUILD_APPEND_ARGUMENTS="--test_tag_filters=-no_gpu,-no_oss,-oss_serial --color no"
./tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_parameterized_build.sh

Afterwards , I can use the docker image created (tf_ci.cpu.ppc64le) to run bazel test on a single testcase as you have above.

body:
@sandipmgiri , this test is not failing for me on ppc64le.

This is how I run the entire unit test bucket:
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
screen -L
export TF_BUILD_CONTAINER_TYPE="CPU.PPC64LE"
export TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION="PYTHON2"
export TF_BUILD_IS_OPT="OPT"
export TF_BUILD_IS_PIP="NO_PIP"
export TF_BUILD_APPEND_ARGUMENTS="--test_tag_filters=-no_gpu,-no_oss,-oss_serial --color no"
./tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_parameterized_build.sh

Afterwards , I can use the docker image created (tf_ci.cpu.ppc64le) to run bazel test on a single testcase as you have above.
